message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split. We have plenty of time to negotiate a better deal later.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair.  Let's start negotiating from a more balanced position.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I think a 60/40 split is still too lopsided. Let's meet in the middle and try a 55/45 split.  It's fairer to both of us, and we can avoid further losses due to inflation.
